RSNet

Installation

  • Using devtools package
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("montilab/RSNet")

Usage

The Conditional Gaussian Bayesian Network (CGBN) functionalities ensemble_cgbn and consensus_net_cgbn are optional and require the RHugin package. Installation instructions for macOS, windows, and Linux.

(i) Load R packages 

library(RSNet)
